result.title: Why am I getting wrong answer at test 6 despite using "disjoint set union find" algorithm correctly?
result.content:
The problem: http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/217/A (Ice Skating — DIV 1A)

In this problem I used 'disjoint set union find' to find the number of connected components, and then saved this number in an integer named "ans" and outputted ans — 1.

my code: http://codeforces.com/contest/217/submission/27711774
